%%{init: {'theme': 'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#667eea', 'secondaryColor': '#764ba2', 'tertiaryColor': '#1e1e2e', 'primaryTextColor': '#ffffff'}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(Sepolia) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(Sepolia) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(Lasna) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(Sepolia) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot() Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(asset) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(assetIds, apys, allocations) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(executeRebalance) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(newAllocations) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
